name: Penumbra (jackalyde, Gulfbones, EmilyEnchants, Veechypoo, devastator1313, TheHonduranCrab, shyrye17)
name_original: Penumbra (jackalyde, Gulfbones, EmilyEnchants, Veechypoo, devastator1313, TheHonduranCrab, shyrye17)
description:
Play as a mysterious hero that has awoken in an unfamiliar cave with nothing but your cloak and a candle. After escaping you discover that the nearby town of Penumbra has been encased in an unending darkness, with shadow creatures overrunning the surrounding areas. 

Light up the town and fend off the shadows to save the residents and bring light to Penumbra.

Controls:
Move: W, A, S, D 

Bright Flame: K

Hide Flame: J

Drop a light source: L

Download Instructions:

1. Un-Zip the file

2. Open "Penumbra_Game.exe"

3. Enjoy!
